snippet: A doping confession could mean even more legal trouble for Lance Armstrong, who already faces several civil lawsuits, including a federal whistle-blower case filed in 2010 by his former teammate Floyd Landis.
abstract: Lance Armstrong, who already faces several civil lawsuits, including federal whistle-blower case filed in 2010 by his former teammate Floyd Landis, may face more legal trouble because of his doping confession.
lead_paragraph: A doping confession could mean even more legal trouble for Lance Armstrong, who already faces several civil lawsuits, including a federal whistle-blower case filed in 2010 by his former teammate Floyd Landis.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong’s Confession Could Mean More Legal Trouble
headline.main: Armstrong’s Confession Could Mean More Legal Trouble
